title: Uchuu Senkan Tiramisù (Dub)
description: The human race extended its life field and greed to the vast reaches of space... In Space Era 0156, a war breaks out amidst all of the colonies in space. Earth begins to construct a new space battleship called Tiramisu in secret. Just as the war begins, one genius pilot steers the Tiramisu as a beacon of hope for humanity.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Seinen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Space>]
